job_title: Silicon Photonics Validation and Characterization Test Engineer
job_description:
• Proven experience in the field of optical interconnects and silicon photonicsFamiliar with general test & manufacturing of silicon photonicsGood communication skills and ability to work with geographically distributed engineering teams.
• Hands-on experience with high-speed test equipment such as bit error rate testers, digital communication analyzers, real-time oscilloscopes, vector network analyzers, and arbitrary waveform generators.
• Hands-on experience with optical test equipment, including swept laser sources, power meters, optical spectrum analyzers, optical time domain reflectometers, optical amplifiers, and best practices in optical test systemsHands-on experience with electrooptic wafer and die-level test systems Collaborate with silicon design, product & test, and packaging teams to architect & define test solutions for silicon photonics at wafer-sort, die-level, and CPO-levelCollaborate with design, packaging, and key suppliers to understand structural and parametric mechanisms for performance, yield, reliability and quality issuesInterface with suppliers to provide technical inputs & test requirements to enable production-worthy end-to-end solutionsDeep knowledge to train other teams & engineers in the field of silicon photonics from design, packaging, to volume testResponsible for identifying & mitigating test challenges and executing large technical projects and processes in a timely mannerSpecify and develop test fixtures in collaboration with Hardware, PCB, and Firmware engineers.
• This enables us to remember your preferences (for example, your choice of language or region) or when you register on areas of the Sites, such as our web programs or extranets.
• Software development for test automation such as with PyVISA, MATLAB, or other development tools.
• Familiarity with wireline analog and digital signal processing techniques such as FFE, DFE, and CTLE or with optical communication systems with concepts such as optical-signal-to-noise ratio, receiver sensitivity, optical modulation amplitude, and optical filtering.
• Develop test automation software in collaboration with design engineers.
• Functionality Cookies Switch Label labelThese cookies are used to recognize you when you return to the Sites.

• Minimum QualificationsStrong programing skills (preferably in Swift and C/C++).
• Experience with digital audio.
• Solid understanding of software architecture and API design.
• Solid understanding of audio programming, object-oriented methodologies, and multi-threaded programming.
